title: Relationship Counseling: Warriors Edition | Group Chat (Ep. 338)
description:
Jimmy Butler’s debut for the Sixers didn’t go quite as smoothly as it could’ve—what does that mean for Ben Simmons (2:00)? Plus, Kevin Clark on the Magic (11:38), and a whole lot of Draymond Green and Kevin Durant melodrama (24:36).

Hosts: Chris Ryan, Justin Verrier, Paolo Uggetti, Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
